projects.name: App&Flow
projects.description: Logo and brand refresh + full site redesign for the MTL app dev agency - App&Flow. A follow up collaboration where I was tasked to elevate the brand look and feel to compete with other agencies.

projects.name: Daytona
projects.description: Early brand and product for work for Daytona, the enterprise-grade Codespaces alternative for managing self-hosted, secure and standardized dev environments.

projects.name: GitHub Universe23
projects.description: Landing page for GitHub Universe 2023 with a fresh new layout and branding kit. The design aims at being a reusable container for future events branding and content - simple layout, big boxes and expressive typography.

projects.name: Roam
projects.description: Roam is the platform for affordable home ownership. I helped shape the first 2 versions of the branding and the website.

projects.name: Ottomate
projects.description: Ottomate is a lifecycle marketing company providing consulting and training. I got the chance to shape from idea to production. Black and white circular logo. Custom HTML/CSS build, no framework.

projects.name: Café Welina
projects.description: Café Welina is a Hawaiian-themed café in the Montréal metro area. The branding aimed to emulate tasteful notes of Polynesian culture through historical and natural artifacts such as the Lehua flower.

projects.name: Mona Sans Microsite
projects.description: I took part in the design to the page and various assets presenting the fonts by GitHub. The design uses a bold poster aestetic and was built around showcasing the capabilities of the variable font.

projects.name: emdashreads
projects.description: Initially a side project to put a friend book out there. We made —reads to publish online books by independent authors. No legacy file formats, no Amazon or Apple games.

projects.name: GitHub CI/CD solution page
projects.description: I designed the first solutions page for GitHub CICD suite. This page present the tools and features offered by GitHub to solve CI/CD problematics. The page artulates around a simple storyline: Build > Test > Deploy, with animated demo and specs for each.

projects.name: App & Flow
projects.description: App & Flow is a Montreal-based development team for hire. I redesigned their website and refreshed the branding: minimal 2 column layout, responsive, dark theme, Isometric illustration, and a bit of gradient glow.

projects.name: Github Copilot page
projects.description: Copilot is Github's Ai product. It uses the OpenAI Codex to suggest code and entire functions in real-time, right from your editor. I got to design the page layout and the various animated graphics for the product launch.

projects.name: GitHub Discussions page
projects.description: Discussions is GitHub's community oriented tab, right in the ecosystem. I worked on the design and animated demos.

projects.name: Eisen
projects.description: I helped designing the first version of Eisen visual identity and website in a few weeks. Eisen is a crypto infrastructure startup.

projects.name: Opendoor illustrations
projects.description: Selected illustrations made for Opendoor's blog between 2021-2022

projects.name: The Manual
projects.description: The Compound Manual – is a web based platform that features wealth planning resources for founders and startup employees. The design approach for this project was to find ways to make references to physical books in the UI. Artifacts such as covers, grain, and page paper bend when opening the navigation are visual hints at the physical book via the UI on screen.

projects.name: Kicks
projects.description: I tried to make a an NFT collection with friends. It didn't go anywhere but it was fun and I got to make a bunch of stuff, fun times.

projects.name: Opendoor.com
projects.description: As a designer at Opendoor between 2016-2022, my main focus was the evolution of the website. One of the most important task was to evolve the homepage to reflect new product, strategies, design system and conversion.

projects.name: Opendoor product design
projects.description: Work done for Opendoor's various products between 2016-2022

projects.name: Opendoor brand design
projects.description: I worked on all things brand at Opendoor: Guidelines, illustrations, icon and other facets of how Opendoor looks and feel.

projects.name: Opendoor Brand evolution
projects.description: I led the brand/visual work during the brand evolution effort where Opendoor set out to elevate by improving consistency of its patterns and establish a strong system geared toward production quality.

projects.name: Opendoor illustrations
projects.description: I got the opportunity of working on a bunch of illustrations over the years. Mostly blog covers, social promotions and press announcements.

projects.name: Cosmodrome
projects.description: A series of poster inspired by the retro-futurist aestetic.

projects.name: Broadcast
projects.description: Broadcast streamlines recurring updates, empowering every person with information they need when they need it. I helped Broadcast define it's early product and brand.

projects.name: Realkit website
projects.description: Designed realkit.com - a simple, 4 pages, responsive website. Showcasing the beautiful real estate media assets created by Realkit.

projects.name: Realkit
projects.description: Realkit – is a marketing suite for anyone in the real estate community. The goal and vision behind the company is to harness and provide many marketing tools for commercial and residential real estate agents. The visual identity's goal was to simply convey the concept of realtor's kit.

projects.name: Irrational Labs
projects.description: I have been helping Irrational labs translate their insights into mockups fitting their clients brand and product ecosystems. Since 2020, we collaborated on projects for Linkedin, TikTok, Belong health, Envestnet, Microsoft News.

projects.name: Compound
projects.description: Compound's mission is to offer a solution to manage your holistic financial life. I got the chance to shape the first version of the brand visual identity, landing page, and product UI.

projects.name: Trym
projects.description: Trym is an online insurance marketplace dedicated to small business. My role was to help get the team's vision off the ground and give it its first shape.

projects.name: Federal Compass
projects.description: Federal Compass is a SaaS solution that enables strategy, growth, and process for federal contractors. I worked on the branding and first homepage.

projects.name: Culdesac
projects.description: I had the chance of working with Culdesac in 2018 as the company just started. Culdesac is a technology-driven developer and property manager building car-free communities from scratch. I created the first version of the guidelines, landing page and resident app focusing on the neighborly vibe with warm color and lots of white space.

projects.name: Opendoor illustrations
projects.description: I've created a bunch of illustrations for various project at Opendoor. We started to develop our own style across our different product and platform. I have been able to introduce illustration at Opendoor thanks to numerous marketing projects and tests. After seeing traction and enthusiasm around them we started to include more illustrations in our product and website.

projects.name: Opendoor Email
projects.description: I've been in charge of defining the style guide for Opendoor emails (marketing, internal, transactional). I spent a lot of time reacting to requests form different team. As the company scaled I defined a simple and robust style guide that reflected the look and feel of the brand emails while being flexible and compatible enough to accommodate each type of email we send. I also coded a set of HTML templates including all the basic components we used in our emails.

projects.name: Egalapagos.com
projects.description: Egalapagos is a travel agency specialized in Galapagos cruises tailored to the US and European market. The ask was to create a mobile first booking platform. The company being the child of a larger travel services group I also created the branding. The goal was to create a first version of the platform. A simple, functional UI for listing and booking cruises.

projects.name: Tout Equateur
projects.description: Tout equateur is a french travel platform created to share information and experiences in Ecuador. I designed, and built the entire website in wordpress (20+ pages).

projects.name: Mark's Bookeeping Services
projects.description: Rebranding project for an NYC accounting firm. I worked closely with the team through 2 iterations of the website as they adjusted their business model to transition to digital first.

projects.name: Nobody's Perfekt Media
projects.description: My first freelance gig with a US company –  I worked with an agency, designing their identity and website.

projects.name: Iris Interactive
projects.description: Prior to moving to the US I was working at an agency in center France. I had great time and learned a ton, I wish I kept more of the work I did there for memory's sake.
